description:
Lt. Cmdr. Jean Robert Lapp was http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wen-li]`s friend from the days when they were classmates at the Officer Academy. He was held in high regard by Yang, who valued the fact that Lapp`s thoughts and methods differed from his own.
He died in the http://anidb.net/e7160 [Battle of Astarte] when his ship, the http://anidb.net/ch82367 [Pergamonn], was lost in combat. He was posthumously promoted two ranks to the rank of Captain. At the time of his death, he was engaged to http://anidb.net/ch761 [Jessica Edwards].
name: Jean Robert Lap
